title: An Open Book
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>You-san, You-san, can I ask you something?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>What is it? Let’s see if I can answer it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>What is it like to be “childhood friends”?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Huh!? Wouldn’t it be better for you to ask Ayumu-chan about that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I already asked her. She told me, “Since we’ve usually been together since we were little, it’s like we’re family.” So it’s really like that, is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hm... Yeah, I’d say that’s about right.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Please tell me all about it! Everything you know!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>...Let me guess, you got into a new anime about childhood friends, didn’t you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>How did you know!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>You really are an open book, Setsuna-chan...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
